Sent during the handshake.

### Message Name

`version`

### Payload

|      Parameter     | Type   |              Description            |
|:------------------:|--------|:-----------------------------------:|
| `version`          | number | The version of the network protocol |
| `listening_port`   | number | The node's listening port           |
